articles.description: Lionel Messi has his best ever chance of winning the World Cup. If Argentina do, it is a fair bet that Angel Di Maria will be part of the story.
articles.content: When the whistle blew at the end of the final of last year's Copa America, the entire triumphant Argentina ran to Lionel Messi. Argentina had beaten Brazil 1-0 to win their first senior title in 28 y… [+5527 chars]

articles.author: Nick Friedell
articles.title: Nets' Kevin Durant says Kyrie Irving's spirits 'high' amid suspension - ESPN India
articles.description: Nets star Kevin Durant and his teammates still aren't sure when Kyrie Irving will return to the team, but Durant says he's been in communication with Irving recently and his spirits are "high."
articles.content: LOS ANGELES -- Brooklyn Nets star Kevin Durant and his teammates still aren't sure when Kyrie Irving will return to the team, but Durant says he's been in communication with Irving recently and his s… [+2140 chars]
